1.title: Episode #1.1
1.plot: The young detective Jakovljevic and his partner investigate the murder of a young girl who was burned in a cornfield. Investigation leads to a company owned by the victim's father, and it seems that the company is in debt.

2.title: Episode #1.2
2.plot: Aleksandar and Mirko brought Strahinja into custody. During the researching Strahina's place, They found interesting picture of unknown person, which may be a possible clue. Revealing the background of the relationship between Kosta and Natalia.

3.title: Episode #1.3
3.plot: Although inspector Marjanovic and prosecutor Marija indicts Strahinja, Alexander is convinced that Strahinja isn't guilty for murder of Milica. Having found evidence proving that Strahinja is innocent , Aleksandar trying to reopen case, but for Marjanovic, this case is solved. In the meantime, there is another dead body, which is not a coincidence.

4.title: Episode #1.4
4.plot: Aleksandar and Mirko find out that the Milica's boyfriend, famous tennis player is involved in the whole crime more than They thought, cause They founded his French passport and it seems that He crossed the Serbian-Bulgarian border with it in the night of crime. They also found out that new victim is Lidija, former best friend of Milica and also one of the witnesses in case. The investigation revealed that it was not a suicide, than murder and that murders of Milica and Lidija are obviously closely connected.

5.title: Episode #1.5
5.plot: Strahinja suffocated himself in his prison cell. Aleksandar found call logs between Dejan, former Milica's boyfriend and Nikola Kovacevic, Peca's father and minister in Serbian Parliament. Jovan got knowledge of affair between Kosta and Natalija. Prosecutor Marija told to Aleksandar that she is in the fourth month of pregnancy with him.

6.title: Episode #1.6
6.plot: Mirko and Aleksandar agree to arrest Dejan. Aleksandar reveals the connection between the police chief Obradovic, Jovan's wife and Nikola Kovacevic. Aleksandar, as well as Mirko and Pero breaking into the apartment of inspector Marjanovic and finds everywhere your photos from childhood but nowhere of his father even they were the best friends.

7.title: Episode #1.7
7.plot: Aleksandar visited Jovan's wife and shows her compromising pictures of her, so She accepted to works for him. Peca told his father Nikola, that He opened his safe and gave all documents to Aleksandar. In the meantime, Aleksandar contact Srle's man, wanting to meet with him alone and reveals that Marjanovic is somehow connected with Srle.

8.title: Episode #1.8
8.plot: Aleksandar was arrested by order of the director Obradovic, 'cause She got knowledge, on the night of the shooting, He should meet with Marjanovic. They tortured him in order to admit that He was with Marjanovic that night. Jelena and Sava faked evidence in order to release Aleksandar form custody.

9.title: Episode #1.9
9.plot: Tijana has informed Aleksandar, that Srle and his people want to kill Marjanovic, his mother and him. Kosta has visited Natalija and got knowledge that She leave her actions form "Cityland" to Nikola Kovacevic. Kosta has informed Jovan about it, and they figured out that Nikola caused all their problems. Marjanovic told to Obradovic that He knew for her and Srle.

10.title: Episode #1.10
10.plot: Very unexpected turn of events during the research of evidence. Resolving the murder of Milica. Minister Nikola Kovacevic gave his resignation, and Marjanovic was named as Minister of Police and it turns out that Marijanovic is deeply involved in everything that happened, more than Aleksandar thought.

1.title: Episode #2.1
1.plot: After the shooting in the café there are several dead, and Jelena's fate is uncertain. For this reason, Aleksandar is completely distracted, and Mirko tries to be reasonable and perform an insight. Even though he is distracted, Aleksandar realizes that he may have been the target of a shooting that leads to an investigation on a completely different track. Chief Marjanovic is still missing.

2.title: Episode #2.2
2.plot: Aleksandar blames himself for Jelena's wounding and the consequences that left it and he is therefore even more determined to find the murderers. The investigation is developing in several directions, the first hearings begins, it is clear to everyone that the shooting is ordered. Mysteriously disappeared Marjanovic appears and in all that chaos, he takes over the position of the director of the police, but Obradovic does not surrender. Aleksandar does not trust him anymore and only thinks about Jelena.

3.title: Episode #2.3
3.plot: On a press conference in the police comes up to the turnover when journalist Vesa begins to ask questions, not only about Lune's case, but also about Milica's case, treatment with Natilla during her arrest and Zika's shooting. Aleksandar was called by the policeman from the hospital and he told him someone tried to enter into Zika's room by pretending to be the doctor, so Aleksandar orders that the security at Zika's be increased and that security be provided to Jelena. Later, Marjanovic questions Mirko about Aleksandar's behavior, and Aleksandar goes to Obradovic to ...

4.title: Episode #2.4
4.plot: Prosecutor Misko once again brings Natalija on interrogation, but, this time, he is forced to extend her detention due to unbalanced behavior of her during the interrogation. Aleksandar goes to the former associate of his father, Branka, where he is inquiring about Mile's murder. Olja talks to Marija about Aleksandar and tells her to be patient because Aleksandar will most likely return to her and tells her about the man she liked before she met Mile, Aleksandar's father. Due to an article published a week earlier, Mirko is suspended, but he is able to invite one of ...

5.title: Episode #2.5
5.plot: Police picked up Srle's brother Nemanja, but they are forced to release him soon because the arrest warrant was invalid. Lune's case has been thrown into oblivion for some time because unknown assailants are stunning Olja with chloroform at her apartment, and, because of this, she gets police protection. Meanwhile, Aleksandar reveals someone is following him and because of this, he turns to Mirko and Milanka for help, Milanka goes to a secret mission in Nemanja's gang, which is why unknown assailants shoot at the camera above the entrance door of the building where ...

6.title: Episode #2.6
6.plot: Mirko informs Aleksandar his informant Bane has disappeared and that is why a large-scale investigation is launched, especially since Bane's father is Mirko's good friend. On the other hand, Nikola Kovacevic gets instructions on mobile what to do if he wants to get his son back, and in the instructions it is ordered money for the ransom to be taken by Aleksandar personally. In order to ensure that, Aleksandar takes money to abductors, Nikola offers to pay Jelena's treatment abroad. Marjanovic and Zoran are angry because Aleksandar and Mirko didn't tell them about Bane...

7.title: Episode #2.7
7.plot: Mirko picks up Bane's friend Kiza and from him he receives a key lead about who ordered Bane's murder. Marija signs an arrest warrant and, for Bane's murder, the man known as Baron had been arrested, but he refuses to speak and ends up in a 48-hour detention. Marjanovic was angry because Aleksandar arrested Baron on his own hand, but he nevertheless allows arrest and detention. In the meantime, Mirko is inquiring from a retired policeman about the unsolved murder of Biba's husband about which a retired policeman Lezajic tells him he nearly solve the case, but he was ...

8.title: Episode #2.8
8.plot: Marjanovic, with the help of his former colleague, Branka, kidnaps Roncaevic and exchanged him for Milanka, but Roncevic was tortured in the same way as Milanka - by rape. Nemanja's people continue to follow Aleksandar, but he manages to deceive them and make them ride the car into the river, and later goes to pay for Nikola's son Peca and find out who kidnapped him and why. Aleksandar asks Marija for several warrants so he can go to Banja Luka to examine people who were suspected of killing Biba's husband. After extracting the car from the river and during the ...

9.title: Episode #2.9
9.plot: Aleksandar goes to Banja Luka to question the suspects in connection with the murder of Biba's husband because he thinks they are involved in Lune's murder too and because of that, he sends their car to an expert in Belgrade. Mirko sends away his wife and children because he feels that blackness is overwhelmed over him. Later, Aleksandar presents Jelena with the facts about which he suspects Marjanovic is involved in the murder of his father, Marjanovic suspends him too and tells him he could get fired too, while Kiza's mother was abducted, and because of that, he is ...

10.title: Episode #2.10
10.plot: Marjanovic's men are once again kidnapped Roncevic because of which Nemanja launched a search for a woman at who's place Roncevic was earlier - Branka. Milanka decides to return home and there she talks to Mirko who blames himself for what happened to her, and she kisses him before he left. The head of one part of the underworld, Misa Zvornik, orders Baron's murder, and after that, he killed the executor of his murder. Nemanja's people came at Branka's neighborhood where a dangerous account is being prepared.

11.title: Episode #2.11
11.plot: After a bloody showdown at Branka's farm, there remain dead bodies on both sides, and Marjanovic comes to clear the "mess" with something that he hid resurfaced. Before she died, Branka told Marjanovic Aleksandar must know the truth. Sava tells Aleksandar he found something that proves that the cars of the Bosnians were in Belgrade, so Aleksandar asks Marija for an arrest warrant and informs Zoran about everything. Mirko's wife informs him she and the children are next to him wanted it he or not and will be in a different condition. Marjanovic visits Zika at the ...

12.title: Episode #2.12
12.plot: The Bosnian brothers are picked up and detained after discovering that their car was in Serbia the night of the shooting at a café, and later it turns out they are really connected with the murder of Biba's husband. Almost at the same time, the bodies of Baron and Branka have been found, due to which an inspector trio is launching an investigation, and Marjanovic returns Mirko on duty and gives him a special task to find Ruza using her dog as a bait. Police officers suspended from work demonstrate in front of MUP building, during which a craft comes up when Misa ...

imdb.plot outline: The action series takes place in Belgrade at the present time. Aleksandar Jakovljevic, played by Vuk Kostic, a young but already experienced inspector, gets first big case - solving the murder of daughter units a reputable building contractors. In parallel with the developments of the investigation, which goes in several directions, Aleksandar is torn between two women working with them on the case: a young forensic scientist Jelena, in which it is sincerely in love, and the public prosecutor Marija with whom he was having an affair. Alexander revealed that the death of his late father, former police inspector, mysterious and strange way connected with the death of innocent girls. Completely alone in the fight for the truth, He will risk his own life..
imdb.title: Ubice mog oca
plot: The action series takes place in Belgrade at the present time. Aleksandar Jakovljevic, played by Vuk Kostic, a young but already experienced inspector, gets first big case - solving the murder of daughter units a reputable building contractors. In parallel with the developments of the investigation, which goes in several directions, Aleksandar is torn between two women working with them on the case: a young forensic scientist Jelena, in which it is sincerely in love, and the public prosecutor Marija with whom he was having an affair. Alexander revealed that the death of his late father, former police inspector, mysterious and strange way connected with the death of innocent girls. Completely alone in the fight for the truth, He will risk his own life..::Milos Boskovic

The action series begins when the main character, a young police inspector Aleksandar Jakovljevic, despite its problematic behavior, receives an important case - killed the daughter of a prominent man unit whose company is building the largest residential - commercial complex in the region. The investigation goes in that direction, or even torn Aleksandar their problems, nothing leaves the case and digging into every aspect of life of the murdered girl, unaware of the danger which is exposed because someone cares about is to cover up the killing as quickly as possible. Aleksandar tortured and personal pain of the never solved the murder of his father Mileta also a police inspector when he discovers that the murder may be linked both to him solve the murder of a young girl becomes a mission. he don't know who to trust along the way, whether your boss and best friend of his dead father, police chief Marjanovic, Mirko whether colleagues or two women in his life, Mary - the public prosecutor with whom he related, while in his heart does not pick up a young scientist Jelena. While all the risks and desperately searching for the truth, they will not know how it can be really painful.::Petar Milivojevic
